amendment.description: To modify a provision relating to energy management requirements.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2970 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2970 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Gardner to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S420-421; text: CR S420) To modify a provision relating to energy management requirements.
